item.title: FNMA
item.description: score:13 Chances: Consumer sentiment towards housing is increasing, driven by optimism among sellers, which could lead to an uptick in home listings. Fannie Mae’s Home Purchase Sentiment Index has increased for the third consecutive month, indicating growing positivity in the housing market. Fannie Mae’s benchmark issuance program, CAS, is experiencing strong activity, with approximately $1.
